title: Jack of Fables, Vol. 1: The (Nearly) Great Escape
description: Last seen hitchhiking from Hollywood, Jack's now a wayward Fable in the heartland of America. His extreme road stories and encounters with other notorious, renegade Fables are just a few of the situations in store for this fan-favorite character.Collecting: Jack of Fables 1-5
author: Bill Willingham
